nl_prompt: Create a web page for a BMI calculator.

function.description: Users can input their height and weight to calculate their BMI.
The calculated BMI value should be displayed to the user.
Provide an interpretation of the BMI value (e.g., underweight, normal, overweight, obese).
Validate user inputs to ensure they are numerical values and within reasonable ranges.
Allow users to choose between metric (centimeters, kilograms) and imperial (inches, pounds) units.
Provide an option to clear/reset the input fields.
Include information about the formula used to calculate BMI.
